title: Potato and Vegetable Salad with Chicken

ingredients.content: 2 tsp salt, plus extra to taste
300 g potatoes, cut in bite-size pieces (1-1.5 cm)
300 g fresh green beans, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)
350 g chicken breasts, skinless, diced (1-1.5 cm)
½ tsp ground black pepper, plus extra to taste
20 g freshly squeezed lemon juice (1 lemon)
10 - 15 g mixed fresh herbs (e.g. chives, parsley, dill)

preparations.content: Place carrots in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a large salad bowl and set aside.

Place water and 1 tsp salt in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and add potatoes and green beans to it. Set Varoma dish in position and add frozen peas to it. Insert Varoma tray and arrange chicken on it. Season with ½ tsp salt and ¼ tsp pepper. Close Varoma and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile, cut lettuce in a chiffonade (see tip), add to salad bowl containing carrots and set aside.
Remove Varoma, then remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Allow chicken, potatoes and vegetables to cool for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally using spatula. Empty and clean mixing bowl.
Place cream, ½ tsp salt, ¼ tsp pepper and lemon juice in mixing bowl and mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>.

Add herbs and mix <b>15 sec/speed 1<b>. Transfer green beans, peas, chicken, potatoes and bean sprouts (if using) to salad bowl. Add dressing, mix well using spatula and refrigerate for approx. 15 minutes. Adjust seasoning to taste and serve cold.

hintsAndTricks: This fresh salad is ideal for large families or a party, and is perfect for a light lunch or a summer picnic. You can adapt it according to the season with broccoli, courgettes or any vegetables you have at hand. Replace chicken with tofu cubes for a vegetarian version.
Serves <b>8 as<b> a main course or <b>10-12 as<b> a starter.
"Chiffonade” is a method for cutting lettuce leaves or herbs in long thin strips: stack the lettuce leaves, roll them up and then cut slices across the roll to form thin leafy strips.
